House Bill/Resolution NO. HB07898
FULL TITLE : AN ACT PROHIBITING THE IMPOSITION OF INTEREST AND/OR PENALTY CHARGES ON UNPAID HOSPITAL BILLS AND MEDICAL EXPENSES OF PATIENTS WHO EARN MINIMUM WAGE OR LESS
ABSTRACT : Penalizes any officer or employee of the hospital or medical clinic responsible for billing who violates the provision of this Act with a fine of not less than Twenty Thousand Pesos (Php20,000.00) but not more than Fifty Thousand Pesos (Php50,000.00), or imprisonment of not less than one (1) month but not more than six (6) months, or both such fine and imprisonment, at the discretion of the proper court.
